groups.name: spring.ai.alibaba.observability
groups.description: Configuration properties for Spring AI Alibaba observability.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.observability.enable-cost-estimation
properties.description: Enable cost estimation based on token pricing.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.observability.pricing.input-token-cost-per-million
properties.description: Cost per 1M input tokens in USD.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.observability.pricing.output-token-cost-per-million
properties.description: Cost per 1M output tokens in USD.
